section.title: Hi there!
section.para: Hey there, my name's Laura and here's the rundown.

Some quick facts about me:
I graduated from the University of Missouri St. Louis with my Bachelor's in Psychology and am currently pursuing a PhD in Neuroscience at UT Austin.
I would love to own land in Montana or Wyoming but the winters might make me reconsider.
I've been shocked by an electric fence.
It wasn't that bad though. It was really just to keep cows out of where they're not supposed to be.

chapter.title: Shows you need to watch
chapter.para: It's my personal crusade to get other people to love these shows.

section.title: Schitt's Creek
section.para: Schitt's Creek is a hilarious little show that's bitingly funny but also a heart to it. Episodes are only 22 minutes long and go by in the blink of an eye.

section.title: Better Call Saul
section.para: How can you go wrong with a spin-off from Breaking Bad? The writing and cinematography on this show are impeccable. The characters are so well-developed and you get a glimpse into Saul before he was "Saul".
